summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from the U.S. Marshals Service regarding a Freedom of Information Act request filed via MuckRock.com for all USMS records concerning Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his death on August 10, 2019. It includes the original FOIA request dated August 13, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Federal prisoner, subject of FOIA request
persons.context: The deceased federal prisoner (Register Number 76318-054, DOB January 20, 1953) who is the subject of the FOIA request for all US Marshals Service records.

persons.name: T. McElwee
persons.context: Individual who filed the FOIA request via MuckRock.com seeking all USMS records concerning Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's reported death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is widely reported to have died in New York City, referenced in an attached New York Times article.

events.title: FOIA request submission
events.description: T. McElwee submits a Freedom of Information Act request to the U.S. Marshals Service for all records concerning Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: USMS internal forwarding of FOIA request
events.description: A U.S. Marshals Service employee forwards the FOIA request email chain internally, attaching a New York Times article about Epstein's death.

locations: Washington, MD 20530-1000 (U.S. Marshals Service FOIA Office address)
keyFacts: A FOIA request was filed on August 13, 2019, seeking all U.S. Marshals Service records on Jeffrey Epstein (Register Number 76318-054).
The requester notes that Epstein is widely reported to have died on August 10, 2019, in New York City.
The request specifies searches across multiple USMS systems including Internal Affairs, Prisoner Tracking, Warrant Information Network, Witness Security, and Threat Information systems.
The request was filed via MuckRock.com by T. McElwee and forwarded internally within the USMS on September 12, 2019.
The document references an attached New York Times article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein Dead in Suicide at Manhattan Jail, Officials Say'.
